overview: A trio of sexually liberated adults decided to create the X-Team to help people who have sexual problems. This time the X-Team works on a difficult case. A handsome businessman complains that his wife has no interest in sex anymore, and the X-Team promises to find out the reason. It turns out that his wife cheats on him, but the husband refuses to believe this even after seeing the steamy pictures of his wife having sex with other men. The X-Team is about the drop the case when the businessman's secretary offers her help. This exciting 1980s porn movie is packed with raunchy action featuring lesbian sex, artful blowjobs, group sex and much more.
title: The X-Team
